
================
SetupEOSAM
================

.. currentmodule:: nucleardatapy.setupeosam

.. Don't include inherited members to keep the doc short
.. automodule:: nucleardatapy.setup_eos_am
	:members:

Here are a set of figures which are produced with the Python sample: /sample/nucleardatapy_plots/plot_setupEOSAM.py

.. figure:: ../../../samples/nucleardatapy_plots/figs/plot_SetupEOSAM.png
	:scale: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	This figure shows the energy per particle in asymmetric matter (AM) with d=0.5. (left) Microscopic models and (right) phenomenological models available in the nucleardatapy toolkit.
